amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 54 printed in House Report 115-259 to strike section 505 on page 325 that pertains to National Ocean Policy and Ocean Planning.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pingree amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 235 (Roll no. 424).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pingree amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 235 (Roll no. 424).
